issue.title: [C++] Add method to BinaryBuilder to reserve space for value data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1712](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1712). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `Resize` and `Reserve` methods only reserve space for the value offsets. When building binary/string arrays with a known size (or some reasonable estimate), it would be more efficient to reserve once at the beginning to prevent internal reallocations
